Year
month
Day

In Ponomarevok, a 32-year-old man beat a 66-year-old pensioner to death due to jealousy (18+)

The deceased was 66 years old. The defendant has heard the verdict.
27 December22:13Comments

Damage of 5 million roubles: CNG members who were stealing on a new venture did not commute the sentence

The Criminal Division of the Orenburg Regional Court adjudicated, on appeal, criminal proceedings against employees of the enterprise who attempted to steal property by an ad hoc group.
27 December18:13Comments

In Orenburg province, 4 million roubles were prevented from smuggling pork

According to Samara Customs, 19 tons of meat were traced from Russia to Kazakhstan.
27 December15:45Comments

In Buguruslan, an engineer is suspected of taking bribes for undervaluing the energy consumption.

The leading engineer of the electricity supply facility is detained.
27 December12:22Comments

A lawyer from Orenburg sentenced to 3 years ' imprisonment did not commute the sentence

The Sixth Court of Cassation of General Jurisdiction left without modification the judgements in respect of the 42-year-old Vicentiya Boueva, and was notified to the Regional Prosecutor ' s Office.
27 December11:36Comments

Orenburg on the street. A 16-year-old guy (18+) fell off the 12th floor.

Traumas are not compatible with life. Orenday ' s correspondents learned that the deceased had lived with relatives, and he had no conflict with either his family or his place of study.
27 December11:20Comments

In Orenburg, a man set fire to a businessman's house.

The woman gave her apartment to a young couple. In a conflict with a cohabitant, a man decided to burn the house. He's in custody.
27 December10:10Comments

In Orsk, his brother was treated with a dagger (18+)

A violent crime has been detected in the region.
27 December09:47Comments

The resident of Abdulino severely beat the cohabitant to take the application.

And the statement was written exactly on the same subject - a man who had previously beaten his chosen woman before.
26 December22:13Comments

In Orenburg, an 84-year-old grandmother stole a staff member from a nursing home.

It lost 16,000 roubles when it came to apply for food.
26 December20:13video videoComments

Turn the money in the towel: in Orenburg province, couriers were detained, taking 750,000 roubles from retirees.

Young people in Orenburg province are involved in at least five fraud episodes. Both individuals may be deprived of their liberty for up to six years, and their employers are unlikely to find them.
26 December18:13video videoComments

In Orenburg, a fatal accident occurred on the Nejin Highway (18+)

There were several cars, one of which was hit by injuries incompatible with life.
26 December17:35video videoComments

In Totsk, the head of school was caught on fraud.

The accused issued awards to the staff of the educational institution and, after that, took some of the money.
26 December14:34Comments

In Sol-Ilecca, the court will consider the establishment of parental rights for a child victim of a rapist (18+)

The guardianship authorities appear to have signed a document for the transfer of a child to the Centre without the right to do so.
26 December13:08Comments

In Orenburg, a mechanic (18+) replied for the death of a man when the car was unloaded.

The tragedy took place on 24 December 2022 at the Meena Palace railway station.
26 December12:26Comments

There was a rabbit in Orenbury on the hospital bed that suffered from the garlands.

Another victim of a broken new year's girland was an annual girl who hit a tox. The members of the Buzuluc police determine the circumstances of the accident with the baby.
26 December11:57Comments

Orenburg on the street. A Brest man shot strangers in trauma.

Both victims who had never met the shooter were injured. Criminal proceedings have been initiated.
26 December11:03Comments

In Orenbourg, it took 18 drivers to help overnight.

In the east of the region, traffic on roads was hampered by weather.
26 December09:13Comments

In Orsca, rescuers took the victim out of a car that was stolen.

The accident happened the previous night on the side of the world.
26 December09:02Comments

Despite Bastrikin ' s control, investigators had never contacted the mother of the deceased South Ural Hokkeist for a year.

Orenday's correspondents spoke to Ludmila Stepanenko, the mother of Forward Paul Crutia, who died early in July 2020, without having succeeded in playing for the sea club any match. The head of the SCF, we will recall, took the case three times (!) for personal control and spoke with the mother of the deceased athlete, but the investigation of the criminal case is still pending.
25 December20:13video videoComments

...further,

Cases

This section orenday is devotedAccidents, Tragedies, Disasters and Crimesrelevantin Orenburgand Orenburg.
We're following the accident reports and we're telling you the most.Importantand relevant ones.

Avia and car crashes, accidents

Transport events unfortunately occur in large quantitiesevery day♪ Orenday does not report a number of situations, such as " bats " on the road. Our task is to inform readers promptly of the events that need to be known.

11 FebruaryA plane collapsed in PodmoskovjeSaratov airlines with orchards on board. It was the Moskva Orsk flight.71 passengersand crew members are dead.

Landing accidentUrban Districttook seven lives.♪ 18-year-old Camille Kuvatov, like saving a guardian angel, losing her parents, she became a guardian of a younger sister.

Large scale

“Snow prisoners”In 2016, due to heavy metal in the snowOrenburg-OrskThere are dozens of cars. People who freeze in their cars waited more than 15 hours.

Crimes and penalties

We're tracking information on crimes and telling people who and for what he's done or he's gonna be punished, be it.gangs or killersof commissionedthe killing of entrepreneursin Orenburg

Of course, it's impossible to keep quiet about when the Ringers becomeGlobalMMM -Family Copier CooperativeI left hundreds of people without blood. By investing money on interest, many have copied for surgery, housing and other important needs.

Officials often have problems with the law. For example,criminal proceedingsnow former head of OrenburgEugenia ArapovaconvictedHead of Gennady Borisov♪TrialsThe Ministry of Education, the Ministry of Labour and Employment of the Orenburg Region, the Ministry of Agriculture of the Region, addressed them.

Search operations

We don't stay indifferent if the security forces or volunteers ask for help and help from the bandwidths.searching for people♪ Stillnot establishedlocationA serial maniac from Orsca Valeria Andreeva♪

Stay on all the news with me.Orenday♪

Use of materials

All rights to be published on orenday are protected under the law of the Russian Federation. Any use of materials is permitted only in agreement with the Editor, with a mandatory active reference to the source.

The editorial is not responsible for the validity of advertisements posted on the website orenday.ru, the website content of the hyperlinks and the comments. Comments to the publications are personal views of the website users.
